Posts.Content: Jun 8, 2017 11:46PM 3sistersmom wrote: Going in for lumpectomy in either late June or early July... waiting for date! Feeling positive about it. Caught early. Should be okay. Agonized whether to do bilateral mastectomy or lumpectomy. Depending on genetic findings,etc., may go back and do bilateral in the future. Really didn't want to be out of commission all summer but yet don't want to worry about second cancer in healthy breast.
